title: Can't chat in game
body:
While out of game i can chat on the client just fine to everyone, but the moment i get into a match i am for some unknown reason unable to chat.
It's really strange because i haven't really touch league for two months so i couldn't have done anything in that time frame. What's worse is that while in a game every time i press "enter" the chat won't open, but i can read everyone else messages and look at the chat pressing "z". This has been going on for about 5 matches and it's honestly really concerning me, if anyone could tell me what to do to fix this bug, that would be really great...

replies.body:
Hmmmm I wonder if that chatbox was dragged down a little too far, and now the typing box is hovering offscreen. I know it sounds like a silly fix, but try to drag that chat window up a little bit. If that's not the problem, we can go ahead and reset your config files to make sure something didn't go a little wonky in there.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
